name: Story of Two
description:
A Story of Two is a collaborative Master thesis between Animation Film and Game Design.

The team consists of Stef Colruyt (game designer and programmer), Sarah Schmitz (animator, modeler and visual artist), Vinzent Spielmann (music) and Guilian Vandendaele (foley).

Together we created the first episode for our game A Story of Two. 

The game tells the story of a human Steve and a wolf Hungry, who against all odds work together to get rid of a mutual enemy. The whole experience brings the two characters together and an unshakable bond is formed.

What makes our mobile game so special? You can switch character by flipping your phone!

Want to know more about how this is done? Head over to our blog!
